column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Husna - Thanks for your review. Our JINYA Chicken Ramen does not contain miso
column2: and we make our broth fresh every single day. I'm glad you enjoyed our small plates
column3: and always know that if you ever receive an item that you're not 100% satisfied with
column4: just let your server know and he or she will remedy the situation.
